Name: Guardian of the Grove
Story Background: Born from the ancient trees of the forest, the Guardian of the Grove protects its woodland home with unwavering loyalty.
Ability: Whenever Guardian of the Grove enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Appearance Description: The Guardian of the Grove is a towering figure made of intertwining branches and shimmering leaves, with eyes that glow with the wisdom of nature
